hashtags: localoutreach, communityoutreach, englefieldgreenies, englefieldgreen, runnymede, communityaction, brooklands, marksandspencers, shoppingbus, communitybus, goshopping, marksandspencer, lunchwithfriends, englefieldgreenactivities, runnymedeevents, Hallhire, seniorsactivities, getinvolved, thevillagecentre
caption:
The Community Bus is running on the 1st & 3rd Tuesday of every month, taking you to Marks & Spencer at Brooklands. This is a lovely trip to the shops if you don’t have a car, and return fare is £5.

Pickups will be from Hanover Close, Schroder Court, The Hub & The Village Centre starting from 10.30am, exact timings to be confirmed depending on bookings received.

Return time to Englefield Green will be approximately 1.30pm. There are 8 seats on the minibus to enable space for walking aids and shopping. 

Bookings can be made via The Village Centre - call 01784 471110 or email manager@villagecentre.org.uk. Get in touch to reserve your seat!

#localoutreach #communityoutreach #englefieldgreenies #englefieldgreen #runnymede #communityaction #brooklands #marksandspencers #shoppingbus #communitybus #goshopping #marksandspencer #lunchwithfriends #englefieldgreenactivities #runnymedeevents #Hallhire #seniorsactivities #getinvolved #thevillagecentre

hashtags: CommunityWorkout, BattleRopes, FreeFitness, MarksAndSpencer, GetMoving, MorningMotivation, CommunitySpirit
caption:
The community exercise class kicked off with a banger this morning — the battle ropes stole the show! 

We’re here daily from 10–10:30 AM, and it’s FREE + open to everyone. No sign-up needed, just show up and move with us! 

Also — we had a lovely delivery from M&S last night ️ Plenty to go round, so please come help yourself!

See you tomorrow? 
#CommunityWorkout #BattleRopes #FreeFitness #MarksAndSpencer #GetMoving #MorningMotivation #CommunitySpirit

hashtags: MarksandSpencer, MandSHK
caption:
✨中環中匯大廈分店升級進行中✨ 

為提供更優質購物體驗，中環中匯大廈分店現已進行升級，全面提升店內設施，為你帶來更舒適嘅購物環境。 工程期間，分店照常營業，歡迎蒞臨選購。
 
✨Upgrades in Progress at Our Central Tower store✨

To elevate your shopping experience, our Central Tower store is currently undergoing renovations to upgrade our in-store facilities, creating a more refined and comfortable environment.  We are open as usual during this transformation — we can't wait to welcome you as always!
 
#MarksandSpencer #MandSHK

caption:
Starting the countdown to holidays ☀️

caption:
I get asked a lot for office / work outfit inspo, so this is what I wore last week. I keep it classic with easy pieces that I can mix and match and work with lots of other pieces in my wardrobe.  It was a crazy busy 2nd full week in my new role, but I am absolutely loving it!  It took me a lot of years to finally take the leap to the job I always wanted , but I always ended up back in my safe place. So At the age of 54 I decided to (finally) go for it, remembered my worth, get out of my own way and reminded myself I am enough - and here I am. My dream job.

caption:
The recent cyberattack on Marks & Spencer reveals a troubling reality about modern cybersecurity threats. 

The breach, which caused operational disruptions and a £300 million profit hit, demonstrates how even well-protected organisations remain vulnerable through their extended networks. Despite M&S having secure systems, the hackers are said to have used social engineering to compromise a contractor's account, turning legitimate third-party access into an entry point.

This incident highlights a critical blind spot: third-party vulnerabilities can undermine internal defences, regardless of industry. Content Vault recognises that all data is sensitive. Our system is specifically designed to protect video, audio and image files, ensuring media files remain accessible only to their owner and  their intended recipients.

hashtags: Menswear, MensUnderwear, BodywearInnovation, CalvinKlein, TommyHilfiger, FashionForward, Mands, UnderwearRevolution, MensFashion, BodywearEvolution, LuxuryUnderwear, PerformanceStyle, ComfortInStyle, ASOS, Lululemon⁠
caption:
M&S Adds Calvin Klein & Tommy Hilfiger to Boost Men’s Underwear Sales⁠
⁠
M&S is making waves by adding Calvin Klein and Tommy Hilfiger to its men’s underwear range, signalling a shift in how men’s bodywear is being thought about. Traditionally overlooked in the bodywear industry, men’s products are now being recognised for their potential in both style and function. The conversation is evolving, with brands focusing on quality, comfort, and bold designs, pushing the boundaries of what’s available in this category. ⁠
⁠
As consumers seek performance-driven and fashion-forward options, this move signals a larger trend of elevated menswear in bodywear. Other brands, like ASOS with their ASOS Design line and Lululemon with their Always On collection, are also noticing the gap in the market and responding with sleek, high-performance options for men. With premium names now in the mix, we can expect an exciting shift in the future of men’s bodywear, where comfort meets high-end design.⁠
⁠
Want to explore adding menswear to your next bodywear product range but aren’t sure where to start? We can support you with our team of industry experts across design, business and marketing. Get in touch to learn more. Link in bio. ⁠

hashtags: CyberAttack, Mands, DataBreach, FCACompliance, SupplyChainRisk, SpydaSecurity, InfosecUK, OperationalResilience, cybersecurityawareness
caption:
M&S Cyber Attack: What You Need to Know

Marks & Spencer has suffered a cybersecurity breach, exposing customer data through a third-party service provider. The attack targeted loyalty card holders, putting names, contact details, and transaction info at risk.

This wasn’t a direct hit on M&S’s internal systems — it was supply chain vulnerability. That’s what makes it even scarier.

 Key Facts:
• A third-party provider was compromised
• Personal data of Sparks loyalty members was leaked
• M&S is now investigating the full extent

Lesson for FCA-regulated firms?
You’re only as secure as your weakest vendor. And the FCA expects you to prove you’ve vetted them.

✅ Do you know which of your suppliers have access to sensitive data?
✅ Do you have monitoring in place for third-party risks?
✅ Would you survive a headline like this?

If not — it’s time to act.

#CyberAttack #Mands #DataBreach #FCACompliance #SupplyChainRisk #SpydaSecurity #InfosecUK #OperationalResilience #cybersecurityawareness

hashtags: MarksAndSpencer, RetailLeadership, ExecutiveAppointment, ThinusKeeve, RetailDirector, LeadershipNews, BusinessUpdate, CorporateNews, GlobalRetail, RetailIndustry, CEOOutlookGlobal
caption:
Marks and Spencer announced the appointment of Thinus Keeve to the newly created role of Retail Director, effective June 6, 2025. Keeve, a former senior executive at Australian grocery retailer Cole's Quality Foods, Inc., brings almost two decades of leadership experience, having served as Chief Sustainability, Property, and Export Officer until July 2022. 

He also has a lot of experience from various companies he has served. In his new role, Keeve will oversee all M&S stores across the UK and the Republic of Ireland, as well as central store operations, aiming to strengthen the retailer’s store-centric decision-making.
 
Keeve will spend his first month working in stores to connect with colleagues and customers before joining the M&S Executive Committee in July. CEO Stuart Machin highlighted Keeve’s extensive retail background, stating, “Like all new senior leaders, Thinus will spend his first month working in stores getting close to colleagues and close to customers.” This appointment aligns with M&S’s ongoing store renewal programme, including opening 12 new food halls in 2025.
 
Before joining Marks & Spencer, Keeve worked for various companies, including the aforementioned Coles. He has also served in SABMiller and BWX Limited and is an active investor in NanoCap Collective.
 
Academically, Keeve has a number of degrees and diplomas, including a B.Com from the University of Cape Town, an M.Com from Stellenbosch University, an MBA in Exchange from the University of British Columbia, and an M.Sc. in International Management from the University of Lausanne - UNIL. 

We wish Keeve all the very best in his future endeavours.

#MarksAndSpencer #RetailLeadership #ExecutiveAppointment #ThinusKeeve #RetailDirector #LeadershipNews #BusinessUpdate #CorporateNews #GlobalRetail #RetailIndustry #CEOOutlookGlobal

hashtags: globallegalreview, news, newsupdate, marksandspencer, marksandspencers, cyberattack
caption:
Marks & Spencer Group Plc is bracing for a £300 million ($403 million) blow to its operating profit this fiscal year due to the fallout from a major cyberattack that continues to disrupt its sales channels and operations.

The UK-based retail giant announced Wednesday that it will seek to offset the financial damage through a combination of cost-cutting measures and insurance claims. However, the company acknowledged that online orders for its clothing and home goods — a segment generating more than £3 million in daily sales — have been halted for over three weeks and are not expected to resume normal operations until July. 
Tap link in bio for more details 
#globallegalreview #news #newsupdate #marksandspencer #marksandspencers #cyberattack

hashtags: HearingLoss, HearingAids, HearingHealth, HearingCare, Hearing, Deaf, DeafCommunity, DeafAwareness, DeafCulture, DeafWorld, PersonalJourney, Inspiration, MarksAndSpencer, MandSOpticians, MandSHearingCare
caption:
I’ve been collaborating and working with @MarksAndSpencer and M&S Opticians over the last few months to promote Deaf Awareness through my own hearing health journey. 

In their latest blog, I open up about my experiences, from the challenges I’ve faced with hearing loss to discovering innovative hearing aid technology that has truly changed my life. I touch on the past solutions that didn’t work for me, the moment that sparked change, and the incredible results since then. I also share some advice for anyone who might be dealing with similar issues.

A massive thank you to Gyelaine Murray, Abbie Walsh, and @TheStuartMachin for your amazing support throughout this journey!

 Check out the story here: https://mandsopticians.com/blog/post/from-struggle-to-confidence-how-the-latest-hearing-aid-technology-changed-jack-s-life/

I hope my journey inspires others to find their own path to better hearing health! ‍♂️

#HearingLoss #HearingAids #HearingHealth #HearingCare #Hearing #Deaf #DeafCommunity #DeafAwareness #DeafCulture #DeafWorld #PersonalJourney #Inspiration #MarksAndSpencer #MandSOpticians #MandSHearingCare

hashtags: Cybersecurity, ThirdPartyRisk, DataBreach, RetailSecurity, Cyberattack, Mands, AravindRaghunathan
caption:
M&S Cyberattack Highlights Third-Party Vendor Risks  

➡ Content:

Marks & Spencer recently fell victim to a sophisticated cyberattack, with hackers gaining access through a third-party contractor. The breach has disrupted the retailer's operations, with online sales halted until July.

➡ Details:

The attackers used social engineering tactics to bypass M&S's robust digital defenses. The company's CEO, Stuart Machin, emphasized that all businesses are vulnerable to such threats and highlighted M&S's efforts to bolster its defenses through significant investments in technology.

➡ Impact:

The incident underscores the importance of robust cybersecurity measures, particularly when working with third-party vendors. M&S has engaged experts and authorities to investigate and mitigate the breach, with 600 systems scanned for damage and gradually being brought back online.

#Cybersecurity #ThirdPartyRisk #DataBreach #RetailSecurity #Cyberattack #Mands
 
Reference [https://www.thehindu.com/sci-tech/technology/ms-says-cyber-hackers-broke-in-through-third-party-contractor/article69604614.ece]

hashtags: BBC, BBCDocumentary, Retail, CyberSecurity, ConsumerTrust, MarksandSpencer, MandS, CoOp, Harrods, Leadership, RetailEvolution, TheCustomerWhisperer
caption:
Today is Marks and Spencer results day – a key moment in the retail calendar.

But this year, the headline figures are accompanied by a much more unusual and challenging backdrop.

For the past four weeks, M&S – along with fellow British retailers including Co-op and Harrods – has been managing the fallout of a major cyber attack. This is a company that, under the leadership of Stuart Machin has worked tirelessly to rebuild trust, relevance, and momentum across the high street. Now, it faces a test of resilience from a very different front.

I’ve contributed to a new BBC documentary released today – Inside the High Street Cyber-Attacks – which explores what really happened, how these brands were targeted, and crucially, how businesses can better protect and prepare themselves.

My focus, as ever, is the consumer. What do they experience during a cyber crisis? How is trust maintained or lost? And how can retailers communicate clearly and compassionately in a world full of jargon and confusion?

This isn’t just an IT issue – it’s a boardroom conversation, and one that affects reputation, loyalty, and business continuity.

The documentary is now available on BBC iPlayer, and I hope it helps shed light on the scale of the challenge – and the steps retailers must take to navigate it with clarity and care.

The Customer Whisperer TV 

Insight with Passion Consultancy 

Hardcastle Collective 

Sara Cameron 
Speakers Corner 
BBC News 

#BBC #BBCDocumentary 
#Retail #CyberSecurity #ConsumerTrust #MarksandSpencer #MandS #CoOp #Harrods #Leadership #RetailEvolution #TheCustomerWhisperer

hashtags: hardwicke, a38, gloucester, gloucestershire, forte, mobil, littlechef, mcdonalds, drivethru, esso, sparuk, mace, bp, marksandspencer, wildbeancafe, bppulse, servicesking, roadtrip
caption:
Next up today is a visit to Hardwicke services situated on the A38 just off junction 12 of the M5 to the south of the city of Gloucester.

This service area was originally planned as a standalone restaurant by Whitbread in 1988. This plan was refused, with Mobil and Forte teaming up to open a filling station and the Hardwicke branch of Little Chef here in October 1990 instead.

The Little Chef closed in 2001 due to falling trade, later being demolished and replaced by a @mcdonaldsuk drive-thru restaurant.

The filling station became Esso branded in the 2000s and was redeveloped in summer 2010, flipping the layout of the site. The new forecourt opened with a SPAR store, which later became a Mace store in 2014.

@bp_plc acquired the forecourt in November 2016, switching the sales building to their partner brand @marksandspencerfood 

A bp pulse EV charger has since been added in 2023.

#hardwicke #a38 #gloucester #gloucestershire #forte #mobil #littlechef #mcdonalds #drivethru #esso #sparuk #mace #bp #marksandspencer #wildbeancafe #bppulse #servicesking #roadtrip

caption:
⭐️ New in the M&S Foodhall – ready to go WILD? 

BIG news for lovers of all things PISTACHIO AND CHOCOLATE.

Save yourself the airfare to Dubai and get yourself down to your local Foodhall…our iconic Big Daddy Bar has been given a nutty new twist!

We’ve absolutely LOADED our chunky creamy milk chocolate bar with smooth pistachio crème, caramel and roasted pistachio pieces for an extra special M&S twist on the viral chocolate sensation.

Find it in your local M&S Foodhall NOW!

#ThisIsNotJust

hashtags: chocolate, pistachio, dubai, caramel, bigdaddy, thebigdaddypistachio, marksandspencer, marksandspencerfood, mymarksfave, thisisnotjust, marksandspencerfoodpr, foodblogger

#chocolate #pistachio #dubai #caramel #bigdaddy #thebigdaddypistachio 
#marksandspencer #marksandspencerfood #mymarksfave #thisisnotjust #marksandspencerfoodpr #chocolate #foodblogger

hashtags: NEW, mymarksfave, thisisnotjust, pistachio, bigdaddypistachio, chocolatebar, chunky, pistachiocreme
caption:
BRAND NEW – It’s out today!
The highly anticipated M&S The Big Daddy Pistachio Bar has landed, and we’re one of the first to review it! 

This chunky chocolate bar features a creamy white chocolate and pistachio crème centre, layered with soft caramel – and it’s massive! It feels seriously weighty in the packaging.

The flavour? Unreal. We weren’t sure how the caramel would work with pistachio, but the salty pistachio crème perfectly balances the sweet caramel and smooth milk chocolate. We couldn’t stop eating it… Honestly, we could demolish the whole thing in one sitting.

Hot tip: We hit M&S as soon as it opened, and they were already flying off the shelves – so be quick!

Available now at @marksandspencerfood – £8.50
SR Rating: 9.2/10

#NEW #mymarksfave #thisisnotjust #pistachio #bigdaddypistachio #chocolatebar #chunky #pistachiocreme

hashtags: ThisIsNotJust
caption:
New in the M&S Foodhall ⭐ BIG biscuit breaking news! 

You LOVED our chocolate-coated custard creams and bourbons last year, and went wild when we added extra cream filling to our regular biccies... Now say hello to our Giant Custard Creams and Bourbon Biscuits!! 

Our experts have worked hard with our bakers to ensure these tremendous treats taste exactly the same as their regular-sized versions, just bigger! 

Find them in the home baking aisle along with all your other favourite ice cream accompaniments - they’re perfect for making ice sandwiches or for topping your sundaes! 

#ThisIsNotJust

hashtags: thisisnotjust
caption:
It’s officially asparagus season so why not try our incredible Cacio e pepe butter beans with charred asparagus recipe! 
 
The flavours are inspired by cacio e pepe, though not in the traditional sense, our Collection giant butter beans are cooked until super-creamy with parmesan and black pepper then served with charred broccoli, our best in season British asparagus and a fiery chilli sauce ️
 
Plus you can swap the pecorino for a veggie alternative to make this dish vegetarian!
 
Let us know if you’ll be trying it in the comments! 

#thisisnotjust

caption:
NEW M&S Alphonso the Chick Cheesecakes 

Cheesecake lovers, you’re going to adore these! With their super cute chick design (although one of ours came with a rather unique addition - can you spot it?), they’re almost too cute to eat.

Inside, you’ll find a smooth vanilla cheesecake and tangy mango compote, all coated in white chocolate and topped with crunchy meringue pieces. Absolutely delicious!

Perfect for when it’s just the two of you this Easter, and you fancy a little something special.

Available now at @marksandspencerfood – £5 for the pack.

SR Rating: 8.5 / 10

caption:

We all love a squishy Hot Cross Bun (or four) but we’ve got another baked delight for you to try this Easter too!

We are well and truly in the springtime spirit with our infamous rich Café Easter Egg Chocolate Cake now available in the Foodhall for the first time!

Will you be tucking in this Easter?

hashtags: thisisnotjust
caption:
⭐️ New in the M&S Foodhall – this gorgeous new rosé is giving us butterflies! 
 
Say hello to the one and only Lady A – the iconic pink wine created by Soho House in collaboration with the prestigious Château La Coste in Provence, and known for being the favourite of many a celebrity! 
 
It’s safe to say one sip of this VIP rosé will transport you straight to the sunny Côte d’Azur ☀ With refreshing flavours of citrus, pink grapefruit, peach and raspberry, it’s as delicious enjoyed on its own as it is served with food! 

#thisisnotjust

caption:

It’s the perfect opportunity to dust off that barbecue and stock up on our new high-protein grilling options! 

Choose from favourites like our New Smashed Beef Burgers or explore our grill selection with exciting NEW options such as Chicken Shawarma Kebabs, Italian-style chicken Dogs, Lamb Merguez Sausages, Nduja King Prawn Skewers, and so much more! 

If you’d rather not fire up the barbecue (or if the unpredictable British weather has other plans), all our grilling delights can be easily prepared in the oven!

Discover our award-winning BBQ treats at your nearest M&S Foodhall today! #thisisnotjust #awardwinning

hashtags: SiberSaldırı, MarksAndSpencer, DragonForce, MSSaldırı, VeriGüvenliği, PerakendeKrizi, OnlineAlışveriş, KüreselEkonomi, KıbrısHaberleri, AdanınNabzı, KıbrısObjektif, EkonomiGündemi, SiberGüvenlik
caption:
Perakende Devine Siber Saldırı Şoku: Türkiye'de de Mağazaları Var! 

İngiltere merkezli perakende devi Marks & Spencer (M&S), uğradığı büyük siber saldırının ardından mali yıl sonu faaliyet kârında 300 milyon sterlinlik (yaklaşık 403 milyon dolar) kayıp öngördüğünü duyurdu.

 Online satışlar durdu: Özellikle giyim ve ev ürünleri satışlarında günlük 3 milyon sterlinden fazla gelir sağlayan M&S’in online platformları üç haftayı aşkın süredir kapalı. Şirket, sistemlerin ancak Temmuz ayında tam olarak normale dönebileceğini belirtiyor.

 Mağazalarda raflar boş kaldı:
Saldırı, temassız ödeme sistemlerini devre dışı bıraktı, bazı mağazalarda ürün tedariki aksadı, manuel sisteme geçilmesi ise lojistikte sorunlara ve artan atık maliyetlerine neden oldu.

 Hisseler çakıldı: Saldırının 22 Nisan’da duyurulmasından bu yana M&S hisseleri %10 değer kaybetti. Londra Borsası'nda işlem gören hisseler, son günlerde de düşüşünü sürdürüyor.

 Kişisel veriler çalındı:
M&S, bazı müşterilerin kişisel bilgilerinin de çalındığını açıkladı. Bu gelişme, saldırının sadece operasyonel değil, veri güvenliği açısından da ciddi bir tehdit oluşturduğunu ortaya koydu.

 Saldırgan: DragonForce
Saldırıyı, daha önce Co-op Group ve Harrods gibi devleri de hedef alan DragonForce isimli siber suç örgütü üstlendi. İngiltere’de son beş yılda siber saldırıların toplam ekonomik etkisinin 44 milyar sterlini aştığı ifade ediliyor.

️ Türkiye’de de mağazaları bulunan Marks & Spencer için bu gelişme sadece ekonomik değil, aynı zamanda markaya duyulan güven açısından da büyük bir sınav niteliği taşıyor.

 Bu olay, perakende devlerinin dijital güvenlik konusunda ne kadar savunmasız kalabileceğini bir kez daha gözler önüne serdi.

#SiberSaldırı #MarksAndSpencer #DragonForce #MSSaldırı #VeriGüvenliği #PerakendeKrizi #OnlineAlışveriş #KüreselEkonomi #KıbrısHaberleri #AdanınNabzı #KıbrısObjektif #EkonomiGündemi #SiberGüvenlik

hashtags: ad, ambassador, thisisnotjust, chocolate, toomuchchocolate, kidney, transplant, kidneytransplantee, kidneytransplant, hope, lifeline, gratitude, journey, health, blessings, healthcare, surgery, donor, organdonation, transplante, riñones, saludrenal, bloodpressure, ckd, kidneyfailure, kidneyhealth
caption:
Day 6 - back early doors to the hospital, this time collecting a roast chicken and sweetcorn and a BLT from @marksandspencerfood (should be #ad #ambassador #thisisnotjust , though sadly we are not there yet...!!! ). So our delightful patient had a half of each (in all honesty she felt both sandwiches tasted really quite salty!), then munched the ham and egg she had ordered, and her fruit! No appetite problems over here... I think the thrill of not being plant-based while in hospital was really being milked, as neither of us knew what diet and nutrition post-surgery was going to look like (and hospital food options are, well, limited... amazing given all they do etc, though if looking for appetising plant-based offerings, I think there were boiled carrots......) (I know this is something that @plantbasedhealthprofessionals are doing a lot of amazing work to try to change). Quick shout out to the nutty super wholefood M&S salad, we love this one, and the outrageously chocolatey chocolate coated boubon creams (have never tried, think we tried the chocolate covered custard creams they do though)... how much #chocolate is #toomuchchocolate ?!!

Also, the first pic in the top left hand corner is a good example of how not to keep your hospital bed area / window sill etc.... she had basically moved in and did not want to leave hospital, and had no real clothes to make herself feel less institutionalised, would eat fast food and sugary drinks in the middle of the night and then keep the bay up being noisy etc., and had so much "stuff" that it meant it was tricky for the medical staff to do their jobs with it all, let alone the hygiene side of it too... still, it was very sad, and her family seemed to be more hindering her than helping her... it's hard to know what to do and how to best help in those situations I think...

 

#kidney #transplant #kidneytransplantee #kidneytransplant #hope #lifeline #gratitude #journey #health #blessings #healthcare #surgery #donor #organdonation #transplante #riñones #saludrenal #bloodpressure #ckd #kidneyfailure #kidneyhealth

hashtags: 本日のお出掛け, BrentCross, ブレントクロス, マークスアンドスペンサー, MandS, 丸亀うどん, スタバ, BBQ, バーベキュー, GodaLondon, London, ロンドン
caption:
✨#本日のお出掛け 
早朝は薄曇りでしたが、朝ごはんを終えた頃には晴れ渡りました。
本日はバスを使って、北ロンドンにあるブレントクロス ショッピングセンターへ。（ちなみにバス料金の支払いで現金が使えません）
このショッピングモール、とにかく広い！事前ににどこへ行くと決めていかないと放浪することになるので注意してください。
ここには丸亀うどんがありました。スタバもあったので、日本の値段と比べてみたところ、だいたい2倍の値付け。まだ1週間ほどの滞在ですが、ロンドンでしか手に入らない物以外は余程でない限り手を出さない方がいいようです。
目的の一つ、マークス・アンド・スペンサースーパーマーケットは、改装中で入ることもできませんでした。残念！

夜は肉！と決めて、BBQの人気店、Goda Londonへ。Google Mapの評価も高く、評判通り美味しかったです。
食べきれない料理は持ち帰り、明日いただきます。
最初の動画は豚の丸焼き。
何かお祝いがあったようです。

#ブレントクロス

hashtags: MAndS, MarksAndSpencer, SnackReview, Strawberries, Natural, NatureSweets, Sweet, Sour, Fruit, Reverse, Pineberry, Pineapple, Vanilla, Foodstagram, FoodReview, FoodPhotography, FoodBlogger, Critic, DiscoverUnder5k, FYP, Luffy, LuffysLunchbox, Freelance, Photographer, ContentCreator, PhotoOfTheDay, DiamondClarityExposure, SamsungPhotography, MobilePhotography, SamsungS24Ultra
caption:
Snack Review 
M&S White Pearl Strawberries 
(Reverse Strawberries)
These are crazy and crazy good!
I love a strawberry & grow my own, but soon as I see these, i wanted to try them and plant a couple to grow!
I have many types of strawberries that grow in all various shapes and sizes but no white/ reverse ones. I call them Reverse Strawberries because of the obvious white/yellow flesh red seeds. Normal strawberries are red flesh w/ yellow/white seeds.
These are unique & give a varied flavour profile.
Sweet, sour, strawberry & Pineapple, some tasting like normal strawberries, whereas others were like pineapples but changed to strawberry on the back of the palette, no vanilla notes for me.
Sour to sweet.
I would recommend anyone to try these. They are lovely refreshing and a great snack, nature's sweets.
Swipe Left--->
•
Samsung S24 Ultra 
•

hashtags: fatloss, gym, fitness, workout, protein, fibre, weightloss, caloriecountingmacros, health, fitnessgirl, foodie, burger, healthyfood, easymealideas, monster, fulldayofeating, dayonmyplate, wieiad, fdoe, food, nutrition, esn, bridetobe, weddingseries, myprotein, myproteinkitchen, mands, pistacho, easymeal, easymealprep
caption:
⭐️ My food for the day ⭐️

Here’s a little snippet of what I eat in a day, I absolutely love the food I make. I literally fuel myself like a car ️
Dieting or not, it doesn’t mean you have to eat boring! 

• Breakfast, protein oats are my fave!!! You can add so much to them. I’m good for nothing without my breakfast. I’m not a fasted workout type of girl, that just doesn’t work for me. I have a mega sweet tooth so using the @myprotein golden syrup protein powder to sweeten my oats really hits the spot! I’m also OBSESSED with anything pistachio right now too. 

• Dinner, a quick @heckfooduk flat sausage and cheese panini. I was super busy through the day yesterday so I needed something fast. This worked well and the flavour was still there! Super filling and satisfying. 

• Tea, (ya gals Northern I’m not going to change my vocab to lunch and dinner ‍♀️) Chicken breast, potato’s and a  tonne of veg! If there’s one thing I’ve learned from @melwilkfit it’s to bulk your meals out with vegetables whilst dieting to fill you up! Also potato’s are king  

• Snacks, a can of @monsterenergy always  followed by a treat from Starbucks later on. I ended my day with a hot rice pudding and half of the @myprotein dark chocolate bar. 

Don’t limit yourself, don’t cut out carbs and please don’t track your greens  we need all the fibre and minerals we can get. The only veg I track are potato’s, carrot&swede etc. If your coach is getting you to track your peas

hashtags: archive, collections, locations, confusion, mertonabbeymills, williammorrisworks, morrisandco, carehomes, trellis, sainsburys, MandS, shoppingcentres, mertonhighstreet, merton, mertonabbey
caption:
Wednesday Archive Day. This picture is of the model of the Morris & Co works that we have at the museum. Many people confuse today's Merton Abbey Mills as the Morris Works. That isn't correct Morris & Co were never at Merton Abbey Mills. Their works were located on Merton High Street. Today the site is covered by Trellis Care Home and Sainsbury's/M&S shopping centre.

hashtags: newinthefoodhall, thisisnotjust, coldbrew, coffee, mandslocal
caption:
⭐️New in the M&S Foodhall - wake up and
smell the (cold brew) coffee!

We know you all LOVE our exclusive Roast & Ritual house blend in our Cafés and ground coffee, beans and pods in the Foodhall and our super convenient cold brew coffee bags are the perfect way to say good morning to a delicious glass of cold brew!

Did you know... cold water takes a little longer than hot water to extract the flavour from coffee, but the advantage of this is that the final brew is smoother and less bitter!

Simply add a bag to a jug or container with 600ml cold water and leave in the fridge overnight (we recommend 18-24 hours), then pour yourself a fresh glass of cold brew coffee, or mix with chocolate milk and our Foodhall famous chocolate cream for a delicious iced mocha!

#newinthefoodhall #thisisnotjust #coldbrew #coffee #mandslocal

Introducing three new snack additions to our brilliant Only…Ingredients range - and best of all they include THE trending TikTok fruit of the moment – the DATE.

These date and dark chocolate bars are made with five ingredients or less, perfect for those wanting a sweet snack, but don’t want an ingredient heavy classic chocolate bar.

Let’s tell you more! Introducing our new trio:

4Dark Chocolate Date Bar: Only 4 ingredients, date paste, dark chocolate, coconut oil and salt

5 Dark Chocolate & Almond Date Bar: Only 5 ingredients, date paste, dark chocolate, almonds, coconut oil and salt

5 Dark Chocolate & Coconut Date Bar: Only 5 ingredients, date paste, dark chocolate, desiccated coconut, coconut oil and salt

PLUS they’re suitable for vegans!

Find them in your local M&S Foodhall NOW in our sandwich/food to go section!

hashtags: mands, mandsclothing, marksandspencer, marksandspencerclothing, outfitinspo, outfitinspiration, ukhighstreet, ukhighstreetfashion, ukfashion
caption:
The M&S Edit 
In light of M&S recent online troubles, they’ve issued a statement today to say the next time you log in you can change your password for extra security. Why not have a look at these brilliant bits & bobs while you’re there and let them know we still love and support them ♥️
People often say to me “is Marks & Spencer’s getting better or are we getting old?” Ummm… M&S is amazing and I will die on this hill. The good thing is, shops often use the same pantone colours so you’ll find that the red is the same shade, the yellows are the same etc. so you look more put together with items from the same shop. More excuses needed to shop? No.
I’ll put the links in my IG story and in my May Links highlights ad/aff ♥️
@marksandspencer @marksandspencerstyle

caption:
M&S Dine in for £15
 home 

@marksandspencerfood always smash it with their dine in dinner deals. This weekend was quite a busy one for us, so we decided to have the dine in for two deal. 
We chose to have Prawn Cocktail for starter (instead of a pudding), Steak and Old Peculiar Ale Pie for our main and then chose the buttery mash for our side. We added broccoli and peas as we’ve always got those in the fridge/freezer. 

This in the sunshine with a glass of @aperolspritzuk was lovely! 

#steakandalepie #marksandspencer #mands #outsidedining

hashtags: marmite, marmitecheesebake, foodreview, mands, mandsfood, specialinterest, actuallyautistic, arfid, arfidrecovry
caption:
Marks and Spencers Exclusive - Marmite Cheese Bake!!

(I AM A HUGE MARMITE FAN DO YOU LIKE MARMITE?)

I don't really like hard cheese, and usually dislike the flavour of cheddar, so really didn't think I'd like this product. I thought it'd be quality - it's a Marmite and M&S collaboration, both of which are companies with real British heritage behind them - BUT I genuinely didn't think I'd enjoy it..
AND I STAND VERY MUCH INCORRECTED.
This cheese bake is a melty pot of goodness, a mix of cream cheese, creme fraich, marmite, and mature cheddar, and it achieves this lovely, almost smoky, subtle flavour, with the marmit discernible, but not at all overpowering. It's gooey, not sticky, and is perfect to accompany salad or toast. 
I'd love a tiny bit more marmite flavour, but this was so so creamy and gorgeous, I can't complain! I've never liked hot melted cheese before, but I'm now going to be trying other ones!! Do I like cheddar flavour when melted, or is it just because it had that marmitey smoky umami-ness??? Time will tell!
6 or 7 out of 10, very high for cheese for me!!
(And, objectively - a 9.5/10)

#marmite #marmitecheesebake #foodreview #mands #mandsfood #specialinterest #actuallyautistic #arfid #arfidrecovry @marksandspencerfood @marmite

hashtags: sézane, selfridgeslondon, karenmillen, marksandspencers, marksandspencerstyle, mymarks, veronicabeard, spottedinvb, sidehustler
caption:
The past week.

1. Still can’t get enough of this @marksandspencerstyle @marksandspencer dress.
2. Popped into the @sezane flagship and what a treat, such a beautiful shop.
3. E has been busy transforming our bedroom terrace with lavender, mint and bourgenvilla - my new hangout
4. Back to my eternal home in Blackheath - the strolls along the Heath past my favourite pub always feel so special 
5. Who would have thought this was @canarywharflondon ?
6. Quick coffee and lunch @linastores 
7. Always love strolling through @marylebonevillage and past @108marylebonelane 
8. A morning of wellness with @karen_millen and @coral_pearl_ 
9. Friday night dinner @harrysdolcevita 
10. @projectgoodsource kindly gifted me this beautiful bracelet which works so well in my stack.
11.  Love the packaging and styling of these new @bellahadid fragrances 
12. Working in @gailsbakery between Wednesday’s appointments and having a slice of freelancer life 
13. @karen_millen fed us well for brunch 
14. It could only be my dentist @sparklysmileblackheath with these cups
15. Always some of the best flowers @bayleyandsage 
16. One of the rare ‘fit checks over the past few weeks - this @veronicabeard jacket needs more outings 
17. My spiritual home @theofficialselfridges 
18. When your parents crack open the bubbly, it would be rude not to..
19. So good to see you @aslikarakeben 
20. Sayonara London.

:
:
:
:

hashtags: onceahairdresseralwaysahairdresser, wearwhatyoulove, classicstyles, mymarks, marksandspencer, overfiftyblogger, richardegrant, itsgotpockets, shoppingfrommywardrobe
caption:
Day 138 of 365 Days what I wore today

A dress with pockets is always a win to my mind . They are so practical, and appealing , yet  not a detail the High St always wants to add to clothes,  as of course it adds cost to manufacture. One of the benefits of making one’s own clothes is that you can really go to town with these sorts of details ! 

Whilst we’re on the topic of pockets, this morning I was listening Richard E Grant today being interviewed at the Chelsea Flower Show this week and he was reminding viewers of how,  when his beloved wife of over 40 years, Joan , died she set him a challenge: to find a pocketful of happiness in every day . 

Dress is a much worn old Marks & Sparks Number. 
Hair - with freshly cut bangs trimmed by me today. 

Happy Thursday People. 
#onceahairdresseralwaysahairdresser 
#wearwhatyoulove #classicstyles #mymarks #marksandspencer #overfiftyblogger #richardegrant #itsgotpockets #shoppingfrommywardrobe

brandambassador, foodhall, simplythebest, thisisnotjust, kidneyhealth, nourishment, renaldiet, kidney, kidneydisease, kidneytransplantee, transplante, kidneytransplant, recipient, riñones, naturalmedicine, mands, marksandspencerfood, marksandspencer, ambassador, lovefood, food
caption: Day 1 (still!) - by noon it was time to wave a "see you later" to my Mum, my one and only. Gosh isn't that part so awful, for most operations and procedures. It should be full of positivity and hope, yet the anxiety and worry seems to override everything. I am no medic, though I could sure come up with potential things that could go wrong. Maybe TV shows etc. don't exactly help either... Anyway, the operation is due to take around 4-4.5 hours. Though in reality it is no time at all, ir seems a while to fill when so on edge. I know my Mum well, and so having called a couple of our friends, I went and took photos of what @marksandspencerfood were selling in the shop there! She loves their food, as do I, though I couldn't bring myself to have anything whilst she was in theatre. I would have bought the whole shop to share with her once she got to the other side though, all being well. I then went for a walk in a park and paced up and down the corridors (I had a 20k step count I'd been doing every day, and though I did complete it that day, that sort of ended that day for me... hopefully soon I could get back into something like that again, we will see...). Anyway, if you are looking for some #brandambassador partners @marksandspencerfood we are here and will await your call!!  #foodhall #simplythebest #thisisnotjust #kidneyhealth #nourishment #renaldiet #kidney #kidneydisease #kidneytransplantee #transplante #kidneytransplant #recipient #riñones #naturalmedicine #mands #marksandspencerfood #marksandspencer #ambassador #lovefood #food

Hi guys! I’m Daisy and I’m super excited to be your newest M&S Insider!!✨⛅️

A bit about me: I’m a Womenswear Stylist at the Battersea Power Station store. I love to travel, so expect to see a mix of everyday style and holiday looks over the next few months! When it comes to fashion, I naturally lean towards a clean, capsule wardrobe but I also love switching things up and experimenting with seasonal trends.

I’ll be sharing how I style my favourite M&S pieces, from everyday looks to travel outfits, i’m so excited to show you all the ways to style key M&S pieces for different occasions. If there’s anything you’d love to see, feel free to get in touch, I can’t wait to share more with you!

caption:
Cybersecurity Threats Are Evolving

On May 2, 2025, UK retail giants Marks & Spencer and Co-op UK were targeted by the hacker group Scattered Spider, revealing critical vulnerabilities in their security systems. This breach disrupted operations and highlighted a crucial lesson: no organization, regardless of size, is immune to cyber threats.

As cybercriminals become more sophisticated, it's essential to fortify your defenses and stay ahead of the risks.

Cybersecurity awareness isn't just a policy, It's a strategic necessity.

Defend against cyber threats with Ispectra Technologies proactive security solutions: www.ispectratechnologies.com

#CyberSecurity #DataProtection #IncidentResponse #RiskManagement #CorporateSecurity #RetailCyberattack #MandS #CoopUK #SecurityAwareness #DigitalRisk #IspectraTechnologies

hashtags: snack, snacks, snackreview, snackreviews, snacking, snackage, snackhead, treats, foodreview, foodreviews, foodie, instafood, instagrub, grublover, grubbing, foodlover, callmedaddyfatsnacks, fatboygrind, fatboybusiness, carbs, marksandspencers, mands, mandsfood, extremeridge, crisps, crisplover, crispaddict, crisphead, chickencurry, crinklers
caption:
Marks have got a giant new range of new crisps. Rather than go all in, I thought I'd take a shoofty at one. The chicken curry ones sounded particularly tempting.

We all know I have a dirty little penchant for a crinkler. These have a similar ridge size and texture to a McCoy, but somehow, they are less satisfying.

The curry flavour is pretty mild, a bit like when someone talks to you after eating a Coronation chicken sammich. It's not bad, just polite, which seems to be an ongoing issue when posh shops make crisps.

A bit of a nyaaaaaaah you're alright....

6/10

Have you tried these?

What should I review next?

Want to send me something to review? Send me a DM!

hashtags: thisisnotjust
caption:
⭐New in the M&S Foodhall - Reduced ingredient snack klaxon!

Introducing three new snack additions to our brilliant Only…Ingredients range - and best of all they include THE trending TikTok fruit of the moment – the DATE. 
 
These date and dark chocolate bars are made with five ingredients or less, perfect for those wanting a sweet snack, but don’t want an ingredient heavy classic chocolate bar. 
 
Let’s tell you more! Introducing our new trio: 

4Dark Chocolate Date Bar: Only 4 ingredients, date paste, dark chocolate, coconut oil and salt 

5 Dark Chocolate & Almond Date Bar: Only 5 ingredients, date paste, dark chocolate, almonds, coconut oil and salt 

5 Dark Chocolate & Coconut Date Bar: Only 5 ingredients, date paste, dark chocolate, desiccated coconut, coconut oil and salt
 
PLUS they’re suitable for vegans!
 
Find them in your local M&S Foodhall NOW in our sandwich/food to go section!  
 
#thisisnotjust

hashtags: NEW, mymarksfave, thisisnotjust, chocolate, hotcrossbun, dippy, egg, fondant, HXB, fun, bakery, treats, snack
caption:
NEW M&S Dippy Egg Filled Hot Cross Buns!
We initially thought these were savoury with an actual egg filling - but surprise! They’re chocolate hot cross buns with a sweet fondant centre. ✨️

They’re smaller than you might expect but feel surprisingly heavy due to the filling. Some had loads of fondant, others a little less, but overall, it was pretty decent.

We really liked the combo of the chocolate bun and sweet fondant - the sweetness was just right!

Available now from @marksandspencerfood for £3

SR rating - 7.8 / 10

#NEW #mymarksfave #thisisnotjust #chocolate #hotcrossbun #dippy #egg #fondant #HXB #fun #bakery #treats #snack

M&S Food is leading the way as the first retailer to bring you this season’s very first crop of Jersey Royals, ahead of anyone else!  

Thanks to the island’s mild climate and rich, fertile earth, these special spuds have a nutty flavour and buttery texture like no other! The very best of the crop, picked by experts, they’re perfect for spring dishes! Find delicious Jersey Royals in selected stores and inspiring recipes now on the M&S Food Recipe page!

caption:
#sundaymood☀️ - all things floaty for a city break

This weekend my partner and I met up with some close work colleagues in Lisbon. 
We are already fans of Portugal and this city did not disappoint.  Bustling, beautiful and full of history- it was lovely. If you haven’t done already- check out my stories as to why I loved my visit. I will also save this as a highlight for anyone else for inspo. 

I opted for a floaty pair of current @nextofficial trousers (which are super light) with a butter yellow @hm Premium shirt. The trainers were necessary as we covered a lot of Lisbon. 
Hope you e had a fab weekend x.

hashtags: salsoulnugget, mands, fransidoli, rickymorrison, hitandrun, loleattaholloway, everyman, doubleexposure, natashabrice, jamesfowler, dreambeat, 2000s
caption:
SALSOUL NUGGET 

Rilasciato nel lontano 2000 dal duo britannico "M&S" (Fran Sidoli e Ricky Morrison), "Salsoul Nugget" riprende 
alcuni samples da "Hit And Run" di Loleatta Holloway (1977) ed "Everyman" della band "Double Exposure" (1976).
Voce affidata alla cantante Natasha Brice, con la collaborazione di James Fowler, "If U Wanna" raggiunse l'Italia sotto etichetta discografica "Dream Beat".
#salsoulnugget #mands #fransidoli #rickymorrison #hitandrun #loleattaholloway #everyman #doubleexposure #natashabrice #jamesfowler #dreambeat #2000s

caption:
Just wow @marksandspencer 

This is just one outfit from marks that I am in love with!!
Yes, all of it is from m&s.

I think its safe to say we all love a co ord, endless outfit possibilities, and this one is perfect for all seasons really ✌ 

I am loving neck scarves right now, and these colours go so well, I will either wear both together round the neck or one on my wrist and the other round my neck, or in your hair, its an accessory so use it wherever! 
The sandals look comfy and cool, and the bag ties it altogether with the blue neck scarf and jewellery.
I’ve added a sage and white jacket to add another neutral colour and to blend it all in. 

What do you think? What other colours would you wear this co ord with?

hashtags: visitlondon, london, londoncity, londontown, londonfood, ldn, ロンドン, ロンドン旅行, ColumbiaRoadFlowerMarket, ロンビアフラワーマーケット, Victoriasponge, ヴィクトリアスポンジ, MuseumoftheHome, ミュージアムオブザホーム, WhiteCube, ホワイトキューブ, RichardHunt, リチャードハント, MarksandSpencer, MandS, マークスアンドスペンサー, Chickentikkamasala, チキンティッカマサラ, curry, カレー
caption:
イギリス3日目。
すっかり時差ボテもなくなり朝っぱらからサクサクと朝食作り。
朝飯食ったらコロンビアフラワーマーケットにあるお気に入りの店でヴィクトリアスポンジケーキをつまむ。いやはやホントに美味くてたまんないね。
フラワーマーケット散策後はかなり期待していたミュージアム・オブ・ザ・ホームへ。ところがコンセプトをどう理解したら悩むこと多々の展示でモヤモヤしたまま終了。なんだかなぁ…
そのままホワイトキューブに行き、リチャード・ハントの回顧展を鑑賞いやはや素晴らしい‼︎
最後はチキンティッカマサラカレー食べ比べのためマークス&スペンサーで高級なヤツを購入。
想像以上の高級感で肉も旨みのあるのがゴロゴロしていてお値段相応だったな。

#visitlondon #london #londoncity #londontown #londonfood #ldn #ロンドン #ロンドン旅行 #ColumbiaRoadFlowerMarket #ロンビアフラワーマーケット #Victoriasponge #ヴィクトリアスポンジ #MuseumoftheHome #ミュージアムオブザホーム #WhiteCube #ホワイトキューブ #RichardHunt #リチャードハント #MarksandSpencer #MandS #マークスアンドスペンサー #Chickentikkamasala #チキンティッカマサラ #curry #カレー

 Ready for a brand new Easter bun obsession? 

Our first-of-their-kind Cinn-a-YUM Buns are designed to be heated at home, then eaten warm from the oven. 
Sweet and squishy, these scrummy buns are enriched with butter and finished with a drizzle of white icing and cinnamon sugar. 

Will you be adding them to your Hot Cross Bun rotation this Easter? 

Find them in your local M&S Foodhall or on @ocadouk NOW

hashtags: thisisnotjust
caption:
⭐New in the M&S Foodhall – Mother’s Day Edition ❤- biscuits and fizz with a twist…

Treat Mum to some of her favourite treats this Mother’s Day…but in a uniquely giftable way.

Fan of the sweeter things in life? A box of handcrafted artisanal Marshmallowist mallows should do the trick!

These squishy Raspberry & Champagne delights are made in small batches with premium rosé Champagne and are hand-finished with a striking dried raspberry crumb.

Or will our Gelato Inspired Belgian Chocolates take her pick! Gelato flavours include caramel mocha, pistachio and white chocolate, raspberry ripple, mango and cream, banana split, caramel froyo.

And if you want to take Mum’s tea & biscuit pairings up a level, our All Butter Salted Caramel Biscuit Tin is filled with rich and crumbly oat biscuits baked in the Highlands of Scotland, using 21% butter. Delicious!

Find them in your local M&S Foodhall NOW ‍♀️

#thisisnotjust

caption:
⭐ New in the M&S Foodhall – Easter Edition  – meet our next melting middle Hot Cross marvel  

Our zingy lemon curd-filled HXBs have been flying off the shelves this Easter, and now we’re introducing an extra special, extra gooey treat for the chocolate lovers out there! 

Our new Dippy Egg Hot Cross Buns are ready to eat, sumptuously soft rich cocoa buns filled with a smooth yellow and white chocolate filling!

The perfect combination of a Hot Cross Bun and an oozy Easter egg, they’re ready to eat meaning there’s no hanging around either! 

 Find them in your local Foodhall now or online at @ocadouk

hashtags: ThisIsNotJust, MyMarksFave
caption:
⭐️ New in the M&S Foodhall – Mother’s Day Edition  – Connie’s giving Queen energy 

Roll out the red carpet…Queen Connie has arrived…

Available for a limited time only, this extra cute half-size version of our iconic chocolatey treat comes complete with a pink crown and special crown-shaped sprinkle decorations. Yas, Queen!

Perfect for spoiling a loved one this Mother’s Day, find Queen Connie in your local M&S Foodhall NOW 

#ThisIsNotJust #MyMarksFave

hashtags: thisisnotjust
caption:
⭐️ New in the M&S Foodhall – Mother’s Day Edition - biscuits and fizz with a twist…

Treat Mum to some of her favourite treats this Mother’s Day…but in a uniquely giftable way.

Fan of the sweeter things in life? A box of handcrafted artisanal Marshmallowist mallows should do the trick! 

These squishy Raspberry & Champagne delights are made in small batches with premium rosé Champagne and are hand-finished with a striking dried raspberry crumb.

Or will our Gelato Inspired Belgian Chocolates take her pick! Gelato flavours include  caramel mocha, pistachio and white chocolate, raspberry ripple, mango and cream, banana split, caramel froyo.

And if you want to take Mum’s tea & biscuit pairings up a level, our All Butter Salted Caramel Biscuit Tin is filled with rich and crumbly oat biscuits baked in the Highlands of Scotland, using 21% butter. Delicious!

Find them in your local M&S Foodhall or on @ocadouk NOW 

#thisisnotjust

hashtags: ThisIsNotJust, MyMarksFave
caption:
⭐️ New in the M&S Foodhall – Easter Edition – these M&S icons are taking on Easter…

…and they’re all decorated by hand!

Egg-citing news  We’re transforming TWO more M&S Food legends into Easter eggs this Spring!

Our world-famous Munch Mix has been transformed into the scrummiest egg AND we’ve crammed our iconic whips into a brand new dippy egg too.
Let’s egg-splore in more detail 

Scrummy Bunny Munch Loaded Egg - our chunky, crunchy, chewy fully-loaded milk chocolate half egg is filled with speckled eggs, pretzels, white chocolate coated popcorn and fruity jelly pieces

Dippy Whippy Loaded Egg – this orange flavoured milk chocolate half egg features our iconic milk chocolate whips filled with mallow and an orange flavoured sauce. It’s then topped with mini orange flavoured speckled eggs and orange flavoured jelly nuggets

Which are you trying first this Easter? 

Find them in your local M&S Foodhall NOW 

#ThisIsNotJust #MyMarksFave

caption:
Limited Edition M&S Queen for the Day Connie the Caterpillar  

We’re absolutely loving this new Queen Connie, just in time for Mother’s Day! 

Not only does she look adorable, but she tastes incredible too! The surprise pink buttercream inside is a delightful touch, and there’s plenty of it, making the cake extra moist and delicious. 

We also love the cute little crown decorations and pink shoes, such a fun and cute touch! 

Would you buy this for your mum this Mother’s Day? 

Available now at @marksandspencerfood for £7.50. 

⭐ SR Rating: 8/10 ⭐ 

#NEW #LimitedEdition #MyMarksFave #ThisIsNotJust #MarksAndSpencer #ConnieTheCaterpillar #MothersDay #Cake #Chocolate #Review

hashtags: MandS, MarksAndSpencerLingerie, БавовняніТрусики, КомфортнаБілизна, СтильнаБілизна, ЖіночаБілизнаКиїв, БавовнаЛюкс, ЩоденнийКомфорт, НабориБілизни, КрасаТаКомфорт, MustHave, basicwear
caption:
Твій секрет ідеального дня починається з M&S! 

Що може бути краще за відчуття абсолютної впевненості та комфорту з самого ранку? ✨ Тільки ідеально підібрана білизна!

Представляємо бавовняні набори трусиків від Marks & Spencer – твій мастхев для бездоганного стилю та самопочуття! 

 Ніжність у кожному дотику: Найм'якша бавовна пестить твою шкіру, даруючи легкість та комфорт 24/7.
✨ Бездоганна посадка: Завдяки фірмовому крою M&S, трусики ідеально сидять, не сковуючи рухів.
Вигідна елегантність: Цілі набори базових або принтованих трусиків – це розумний вибір для твого гардеробу та гаманця.
 Дихай вільно: Натуральна бавовна дозволяє шкірі дихати, даруючи відчуття свіжості протягом дня.
 Довіра та якість: Обирай бренд, якому довіряють покоління – обирай Marks & Spencer.
Створи свою базу комфорту та стилю з наборами бавовняних трусиків M&S! 

 Не чекай! Онови свій білизняний гардероб вже сьогодні! Для замовлення пишіть в особисті

caption:
Little half-time drop (COYS).

It's a Mark's combo mix, so that always gets my snacky tits tingling. Partial to the tubes, personally.

These have a pretty standard smoky, sweet balance with a teeeeeeny bit of paprika heat on the arse end. Nice, but nowt revolutionary.

Pack of these wouldn't stand a chance with a couple of cold ones. Solid, addictive and an easy....

7.5/10

caption:
M&S CYBER ATTACK!

There are loads of people who have woken up this morning to the panic of no longer having their wedding cake sorted!

As a MUCH smaller business than the multi million pound M&S I can’t match their prices, BUT I can offer a more budget friendly cake and the prices are below. Please take note that I never offer cakes this cheap for this size so this is a one off for those who have been let down and these prices can not be compared to any other cakes as these are budget friendly one-offs. 

I’m happy to help out anyone that I can by offering the below for collection ONLY and subject to availability. I’m based in colchester, Essex

A 2 tier (6” and 8”) semi naked cake with 2 layers per tier will be £95. 

A 2 tier (6” and 8”) semi naked cake with 3 layers per tier will be £110

Whilst I know it costs more than M&S, I can promise they will be delicious, hand made by me, and with so much love and attention to detail! 

Thank you
Annie xx

info@anniescakecreations.co.uk
07349 307586

#mands #mandsnakedcake #WeddingCake #NakedCake #MAndSCyberAttack #mandscyberattack #BudgetFriendlyWeddingCake #BudgetWeddingCake #ColchesterCakeMaker

caption:
For a long time as a wheelchair user I steered clear of wearing colour, worried about drawing attention to myself. But at some point recently I decided that people are going to stare anyway, let’s give them a cute outfit to stare at! And this is exactly the kind of outfit that makes me feel like my best self 

Trousers  cardigan marksandspencerstyle

hashtags: thisisnotjust
caption:
Hands up, who’s ready for their first glass of rosé this year!  Say bonjour to La Balconne, our GORGEOUS new organic rosé from the sun-soaked vineyards of Provence 
 
While angels whisper, La Balconne truly sings!...  Meticulously crafted by wife-and-husband duo Julie Rouffignac and Gérald Lafont – esteemed winemaking experts with insider access to the region’s most prestigious estates – this gorgeous pink wine is a must-try for spring, summer and beyond, and lands in store just in Mother’s Day (you’ll find it by the flowers in selected stores) 
 
With refreshing flavours of red berries , peach  and cherry blossom , it’s an ideal match for picky bits, charcuterie, light pasta dishes and summer salads - or perfect enjoyed on its own!
 
Will this be your first rosé of the season? 

#thisisnotjust

hashtags: mandsfood, mandsmealdeal, thisisnotjust
caption:
Batch cooking today. I do so love the £15 Marks & Spencer‘s meal deal which includes one very large chicken and four sides of your choice. 
I have portioned up my chicken and put some of it in the slow cooker with carrots onions vegetables garlic ginger Bay leaves. This makes four portions of chicken stew  And with the chicken breasts I can make four portions of curry, so that’s eight meals. The chicken carcass et cetera will be cooked again to make some stock for when I make soup. 
The tubs of mashed potato that I chose as my side dishes are in the freezer ready to use as topping  for six cottage pies. 
Job well done, a real money saver. ‍ #mandsfood #mandsmealdeal #thisisnotjust

hashtags: RealBread, RealBreadCampaign, HonestCrustAct, bread, baking, bakery, foodlabels, consumerrights, consumerprotection, tradingstandards, supermarketfood, supermarket, freshbread, foodmarketing, tesco, sainsburys, asda, morrisons, lidl, thecoop, waitrose, mands, thisisnotjust, fakeoff, frozenfood
caption:
We continue to lobby for an Honest Crust Act of updated and improved loaf composition, labelling and marketing standards. 

The most recent governmental guidance on loaf tanning salon marketing states: 

* Terms such as “freshly baked”, “baked in store” and “oven fresh” may mislead consumers into believing that they are being offered products that have been freshly produced on site from basic raw materials. 

 * Some stores sell bread made from part-baked products that have been packed in an inert atmosphere or frozen off-site then “baked off” at in-store bakeries. 

* Use of terms like “freshly baked”, “baked in store” and “oven fresh” on these products could potentially infringe the general legal provisions. 

You can find full details of this, the trading standards complaints we’re pursuing, and all the things we’re doing to champion Real Bread, in the latest news and latest articles sections of the Real Bread Campaign website. 

#RealBread #RealBreadCampaign #HonestCrustAct

hashtags: marksandspencerczechrepublic, marksandspencerceskarepublika, kefirovepalacinky, thisisnotjust, pancakeday
caption:
Dovedete si představit lepší start dne než v doprovodu palačinek? Vyzkoušejte jejich netradiční kefírovou verzi s hořkou čokoládou a slaným karamelem podle receptu @klukvzastere.

Budete potřebovat:
12 PL mletých ovesných vloček
400 ml kefíru
2 menší vejce
½ ČL kypřícího prášku
½ ČL skořice
špetka soli

➡️Krém
170 g skyru
180 g nízkotučné lučiny
1 PL čekankového sirupu
½ ČL vanilky

➡️Na dochucení
slaný karamel
hořká čokoláda
kešu ořechy
borůvky

1.Smícháme vajíčka s kefírem pokojové teploty, přisypeme ovesnou mouku a necháme čtvrt hodinky odpočinout.
2.Přidáme kypřící prášek, skořici a sůl.
3. Opékáme na vymazané pánvi dozlatova z obou stran.
4. Hotové palačinky pomažeme slaným karamelem, krémem a přidáme pořádnou porci čokolády a drcených kešu. 

#marksandspencerczechrepublic #marksandspencerceskarepublika #kefirovepalacinky #thisisnotjust #pancakeday

hashtags: NEW, mymarksfave, thisisnotjust, caramel, Egg, collection, loadedegg, review, blondchocolate
caption:
Will the M&S Blond Egg with a Salted Caramel Truffle Loaded Base be worth the £15 price tag? 

When we first heard about this egg, we were so excited! Loaded eggs are the trend in supermarkets this year, and after loving the Morrisons Loaded Half Egg, we had seriously high hopes for this one. And why wouldn’t we? 

1. It’s from the M&S Collection, so we expected top-tier quality. 

2. At £15, it had to be amazing… right? 

Well, not to be picky, but we were expecting a bit more luxury, especially in the packaging. While M&S’s extra-thick eggs come beautifully boxed, this one was just wrapped in cellophane, which felt a little underwhelming for the price. 

As for the loaded base, we were hoping for something more substantial. And given it’s salted caramel, we expected a gooey, runny caramel, but instead, it’s much thicker in texture. 

That said, the whole egg is delicious, and we cant fault the with incredible quality of the blond chocolate. 

What do you think - worth the £15, or are there better options out there? 

#NEW #mymarksfave #thisisnotjust #caramel #Egg #collection #loadedegg #review #blondchocolate

caption:
NEW M&S DIPPY WHIPPY LOADED EGG – Orange chocolate lovers, this one’s for you!  

This indulgent treat features a thick, orange-flavoured milk chocolate half-egg, loaded with mallow and orange mini whips, speckled orange eggs, and tiny cubes of orange jelly. 

And the taste? Absolutely delicious! We love the addition of the mallow whips as they add an extra layer of indulgence and texture. It’s definitely packed with flavour! 

Our only complaint? It’s seriously tough to eat! We made a mess and nearly broke our teeth trying to bite into it! 

Available now at @marksandspencerfood for £12. Would you pay £12 for it? 

SR Rating: 8.5/10 

#NEW #mymarksfave #thisisnotjust #marksandspencer #chocolate #Easteregg #Orange #flavour #review

hashtags: NEW, MyMarksFave, ThisIsNotJust, Dessert, DineIn, TreatYourself, FoodReview
caption:
Reviewing the NEW M&S Valentine’s "2 Become One" Chocolate Praline Heart! ❤️ 

As part of the new Dine In for £25 deal, M&S has launched some indulgent new desserts, including this shareable Chocolate Praline Heart! 

Each half features a rich Belgian chocolate praline mousse, hiding a creamy chocolate hazelnut centre, all layered on a dark chocolate and hazelnut wafer base. It’s absolutely delicious! The texture surprised us, it’s softer than expected and melts in your mouth. We especially loved the dark chocolate and hazelnut wafer base, which adds the perfect crunch to balance the smooth mousse. 

Another detail we loved? Each half has a different decoration! The sparkles make it feel extra boujee - don’t you think? ✨ 

SR Rating: 8.8/10 

Available now as part of the Valentines Dine In for £25 or you can buy individually for £5. 

#NEW #MyMarksFave #ThisIsNotJust #Dessert #DineIn #TreatYourself #FoodReview

caption:
Marks & Spencer cyberattack escalates: customer orders and data at risk

Just days after initial disruptions, Marks & Spencer has confirmed that a cyberattack has compromised its website, apps, and customer orders, potentially exposing customer data.

Refunds are now being issued, but the incident marks a major crisis for one of the UK's most trusted retailers, underlining just how critical cybersecurity and digital trust are in today’s retail environment.

 Full story via The Guardian:

hashtags: Birmingham, Birminghamcitycentre, hs2, MandS
caption:
UK developer Bluecastle Capital has announced it is to transform the former @marksandspencer store in #Birmingham High Street. It is billed to become a “landmark residential development”.

The company, known for building properties to rent, bought the site in #Birminghamcitycentre saying its location near the forthcoming #hs2 railway terminal at Curzon Street was a factor.

The former #MandS opened in 1957 when it was described as its biggest in the country. It closed in November 2023 when M&S’ new flagship store opened its doors in @Bullring taking over much of the space used by Debenhams.

Since then, Central BID Birmingham and M&S have worked together on a project to allow @bham_childrens to use space around the disused building as a display to raise money.

The charity’s latest fundraising campaign – the It Starts Here appeal – is currently on show at the prominent High Street site.

caption:

#cosynight #cosynightin #freshbedding #bookandbed #ironandembers #fairylootedition #fairylootbook #mymarks #mands #homesense #homesenseuk #homesensefinds #cosybed #cosybedroom #cosyliving #cosyhomes #cosyhomestyle #persimmonhomes #lovemypersimmonhome

Finally got myself down to @marksandspencerfood to check out the new cereal options  

Which ones have you tried? I’m excited to see what they’re like! I got a box of each so will report back!

I have seen some online chatter about these new ‘only X ingredient’ products not containing ‘unhealthy’ additives (for example the oat milk doesn’t contain seed oil) and therefore promoting it as healthier. 

Can we just stop and reverse right here before we walk into the ‘clean eating’ coocoo land - there is nothing inherently unhealthy about seed oil!! I’m all for being more transparent and stripping back unnecessary ingredients in products (plus it has had the added benefit of meaning more people with dietary restrictions can eat it) but promoting products as healthier because they don’t contain seed oil is playing into all the scare mongering of the ‘clean eating’ rhetoric. Food isn’t bad or good it’s just food!

Food for thought?

hashtags: foodshop, whatieat, upf, foodswaps, healthyfoodchoices, supermarketshopping, mands
caption:
If you want to reduce the amount of ultra processed foods you eat, start by making simple swaps when you do your weekly shop, 

These are a few items I picked up from M&S this week with a lot of treats. 

1.) EXTRA VIRGIN OLIVE OIL CRISPS. These are a great find, just 2 ingredients, potatoes and 100% extra virgin olive oil. I think as crisps go these are the best it’s going to get and they do taste lovely, I have not tried the other flavours yet. 

2.) BOOJA BOOJA VANILLA ICE CREAM. Ice creams can contain loads of gums, stabilisers and other unnecessary bits and bobs that make ice creams cheaper, more durable in transport and sweeter for the consumer. So it great to find an ice cream that contains just 4 essential ingredients. This tastes nice too, so give it a try. 

3.) SMOKED ROASTED AND SALTED MARCONA ALMONDS. I do love the M&S nuts and seeds range, they have some great combinations and flavours. This one is just 98% almonds and salt. 

4.) WHITE ROLLS. With just 5 ingredients listed on the front of packaging, what is not to love. I had these on a recent hike with sliced cheese and it was a great packed lunch. Definitely a regular for me. 

5.) BUCKWUD MAPLE BUTTER. I don’t know how long this product has been available but it was the first time I saw it and I was buzzing, I love Buckwud maple syrup so I can’t wait to try this, made with 100% Maple syrup. I am not fully sure how I will have this though. Any ideas let me know. 

6.) BRAIN FOOD SUPER SEEDED NUT BUTTER. I have not tried a nut and seed mix butter before but this was nice. Contains:- Roasted Peanuts (68%) • Desiccated Coconut • Sunflower Seeds (6%) • Pumpkin Seeds (6%) • Chia Seeds (Salvia hispanica) (6%) • Golden Linseed (2%) • Iron • Zinc. I spread this on sliced apples and a banana sliced in half.

I love food and ingredients and i am always looking for good food that is minimally processed, let me know your faves. 

Like this post if you want to see more supermarket swaps and save to remind what to put in your trolley next time  

#foodshop #whatieat #upf #foodswaps #healthyfoodchoices #supermarketshopping #mands

hashtags: food, chocolate, mands, pistachio, chocolatebars, caramel, bristol
caption:
The Big Daddy Pistachio Bar by M&S

This chunky bar from M&S is pure indulgence. With rich milk chocolate, creamy pistachio filling, buttery caramel, and crunchy pistachio pieces, every bite is packed with texture and flavour. The pistachio really stands out, balancing perfectly with the sweetness. It’s even better left out of the fridge — the caramel softens and melts beautifully, making it even more delicious. A must-try for pistachio fans!

Rating: 9/10

hashtags: thisisnotjust
caption:
⭐ New in the M&S Foodhall – ready for another mealtime M&SH-up? ️ ​

This one is an icon in the making! ​

Following in the footsteps of last year’s experimental HIT Chicken Tikka Masala Pizza, we bring you our limited-edition Collection CHICKEN KYIV Pizza! ​

We’ve hand-topped our incredible 30-hour hand-stretched and slow-fermented pizza bases with creamy mascarpone, bechamel sauce, garlic butter and pulled British chicken. ​

Each pizza is then generously finished with crisp ciabatta breadcrumbs for the ultimate crunch and garlicky flavour. ​

As the original UK pioneers of the chicken Kyiv in 1979…it just HAD to be done  ​

Tag a garlic butter lover who’s going to NEED to try this pizza with you! ​

Then find our limited-edition Collection Chicken Kyiv Pizza in your local M&S Foodhall or on @ocadouk
NOW

#thisisnotjust

hashtags: thisisnotjust, slowcooked
caption:
⭐ New in the M&S Foodhall – slow and scrummy wins the race ​

Fancy a cosy night in full of comforting flavour? ​

Our sensational Slow Cooked range is growing, with plenty new serves-4 additions to feed the crew. Perfect for a hearty family dinner or cosy meal in with friends. ​

Made with all the same ingredients you would at home, but slow cooked by our expert chefs to save you the time, choose from… ​

Shred and Share Chicken Shawarma with garlic drizzle ​

Shred and Share Chicken Fajita with tender onions and mixed peppers ​

Shred and Share BBQ Carolina Pork with sweet and tangy sauce ​

One Pot Chilli Beef in an aromatic chipotle chilli, kidney bean and pepper sauce ​
 
Just add sides and garnishes – we’ll take care of the rest! ​

Find our Slow Cooked range in your local M&S Foodhall or on @ocadouk NOW

#thisisnotjust #slowcooked

These scrummy new springtime stars are a zesty twist on the traditional Hot Cross Bun – made with candied Sicilian lemon peel and a smooth zingy lemon curd filling made with Sicilian lemon juice and lemon oil.

Amazing on their own, or baked into desserts, how are you eating yours?

Find our full range of Hot Cross Buns in your local M&S Foodhall NOW

hashtags: NEW, ExtremelyLemony, MyMarksFave, ThisIsNotJust, Lemon, WhenLifeGivesYouLemons, Tasty, Snack, HotCrossBuns, Review
caption:
NEW M&S EXTREMELY LEMONY CURD-FILLED HOT CROSS BUNS 

Wow! When M&S said these hot cross buns were extremely lemony, they weren’t kidding!

This takes lemon to a whole new level! Each bun is packed with candied Sicilian lemon peel and a rich lemon curd filling made with Sicilian lemon juice and Sicilian lemon oil - creating the zestiest, tangiest hot cross bun we’ve ever tried!

They’re generously filled and full of flavour, making them a perfect snack or evening treat for any lemon lover. But for us? They were just a little too zingy and tangy!

SR Rating: 7.2/10

#NEW #ExtremelyLemony #MyMarksFave #ThisIsNotJust #Lemon #WhenLifeGivesYouLemons #Tasty #Snack #HotCrossBuns #Review

hashtags: babyshower, babyshowerideas, babygirl, celebrationcake, celebrationcakes, babyshowers, babyshowercake, babyshowercakes, newbaby, marksandspencer, marksandspencerfood, party, cakedecorating, cakedesign, mumlife, mumlifeuk, thisisnotjust
caption:
Baby Shower Cake…… 
.
I had bought the single tier Vanilla Naked cake last year for my  husbands retirement and it was delicious, so when I saw Marks & Spencer did the same cake in a two tier - I knew that’s what I wanted for my our daughters baby shower. 
.
The cakes come separate so they can be assembled by you at home which is so easy. 
.
You then have the perfect blank canvas to decorate for your special occasion. We bought our baby shower decorations from Amazon and was so pleased with the final result. 
.
And the taste - well it was a light and fluffy madeira  sponge  with vanilla buttercream and it was so good! 
.
What do you think? 
.
@marksandspencerfood 
.

caption:
Happy Easter  
Hot cross buns review

1. TOAD bakery 4.5
- loads of fruits, soft, reasonable price
2. Mahali bakery ⭐️3.0
- TINY, hint of spread, expensive
3. Fortitude bakehouse ⭐️4.2
- good, too much smell of anise(?)
4. St. John ⭐️4.1
- biggest, soft, less fruit but okay
5. m&s ⭐️3.5
- touch of lemon cream, but soft, fluffy bun and lemon peel

.

hashtags: CyberSecurity, RetailTech, IncidentResponse, CustomerTrust, MAndS, CyberResilience, InfoSec, DigitalPayments, CyberAttack, RiskManagement, RetailSecurity, UKBusiness, CyberAwareness, DataSecurity
caption:
Marks & Spencer hit by cyber incident affecting contactless payments and online orders

Retail giant Marks & Spencer has apologised after a cybersecurity incident disrupted contactless payments in stores and delayed online order confirmations — a reminder that retail is now a frontline sector for cyber risk.

In a world where consumers expect seamless digital experiences, even short disruptions can damage trust and brand reputation.

 Read the full story via The Guardian:
 https://www.theguardian.com/business/2025/apr/22/marks-and-spencer-apologises-cyber-incident-contactless-payments-online-orders

#CyberSecurity #RetailTech #IncidentResponse #CustomerTrust #MAndS #CyberResilience #InfoSec #DigitalPayments #CyberAttack #RiskManagement #RetailSecurity #UKBusiness #CyberAwareness #DataSecurity

hashtags: MandS, CyberAttack, ClickAndCollect, Retail, CyberSecurity, UKBusiness, Shopping, OnlineOrders, CustomerService, TechNews
caption:
Marks & Spencer (M&S) has apologised to customers for click and collect delays caused by a recent 'cyber incident.' 

This issue, affecting in-store contactless payments and online order pickups since Monday, prompted minor, temporary adjustments to store operations as a protective measure. 

M&S assures customers that their data appears unaffected and that the website and app remain functional. While a separate technical issue briefly impacted contactless payments on Saturday, the current disruption centres on the cyber incident. 

M&S is actively working to resolve the delays and apologies for any inconvenience.

Protect Your Business from Cyber Threats

caption:
M&N.farmさん
@mands.farm より

【抹茶とあんこの和タルトチーズケーキ】

"ほっと落ち着く、和のひとくち"

抹茶とあんこの組み合わせを楽しめる、
やさしい味わいの和風タルトチーズケーキ

抹茶のほろ苦さと、あんこのやさしい甘みが、
チーズのなめらかさとぴったりあわさった
和のチーズタルトです。

＼※喫茶向日葵さん限定メニューです✨／

甘さには、有機JAS認証の
オーガニックシュガーを使用。

農薬や遺伝子組み換え技術を使わず、
有機栽培で育てられたさとうきび100％から
作られた、からだ想いのお砂糖です。

食後のデザートや、午後のひと息に。
やさしい和のスイーツで、
ほっこりする時間をお過ごしください♪

コーヒーと相性抜群です☕️

(こちらのケーキは小麦を使用しております)

当店のケーキは、食べ応えがありながらも、後味は軽やか。素材にこだわって作っているからこそ、胃もたれしにくいのが特徴です♪

おやつの時間やコーヒータイムに、ほっと心が満たされるひとときをお届けできたら嬉しいです。引き続き、どうぞよろしくお願いいたします！

Creamy, vanilla-y and made with our Fairtrade coffee, bring the zing to your day with this extra-special cold coffee.

Spread onto seeded bread, bake into high protein muffins or devour on your toasted High Protein bagels with your favourite berries.

Or you know, just dive straight in with a spoon… no-one’s judging!

hashtags: MandSHK, mandsfood, thisisnotjust, SesameNote, 芝麻筆記, lifestyle
caption:
馬莎推出農曆新年服裝及食品
新春食品優惠購買第二件半價

馬莎誠邀大家「感受新春好運」，以高貴典雅的賀年系列迎接蛇年。糅合傳統與時尚品味，馬莎為一家大小帶來集優雅與歡樂於一身的賀年精選。由時尚服飾以至佳節美食，馬莎悉心打造豐富多彩的春節體驗，讓您展現獨特格調，共享天倫之樂。

今個新春，馬莎特別設計多元化的時尚系列，以細膩剪裁和精緻用料，展現獨特的節日風格。無論是團年飯、親友拜年，抑或其他新春聚會，都能讓您展現新春活力，盡享佳節氛圍。

馬莎新春食品優惠
由即日起至2025年2月2日，精選餅乾禮盒包括比利時朱古力什錦餅禮盒、蘇格蘭牛油香酥餅禮盒，以及什錦朱古力餅禮盒等，即享購買第二件半價。

此外，由即日至1月21日，精選節慶特色糖果如車厘子酒心黑朱古力（250克）及榛子果仁軟心朱古力（150克），可享兩件$79優惠。

caption:
Fuel up with the ultimate healthy pitstop at the M&S Café this year. ​

We’ve added four new fresh, vibrant, and totally mouth-watering additions to our menu. ​

If you like your breakfasts fruity, our gut-friendly Eat Well Sunshine Bowl is filled with Good Gut Kefir Yoghurt, fresh mango and pineapple and a super-seeded wheat granola, all finished with a passionfruit drizzle. Not only is it Eat Well, it’s also 1 of your 5 a day. ​

If you’re looking for something on the savoury side, our Super Greens Omelette Bowl with an avocado, feta and grain salad, and creamy dressing is perfect! Or perhaps you're in the mood for our Eat Well Loaded Tomato & Basil soup topped with pesto and crispy pitta chips... yum!

Wash all of them down with our incredible caffeine-free Spiced Turmeric Latte, full of warming cinnamon, ginger and black pepper flavours and a touch of maple syrup. ​

Will we be seeing you soon?

#MyMarksFave #thisisnotjust

 Let the battle of the @marksandspencerfood bars commence, with Whip Off The Old Block vs The Big Daddy

caption:
NEW M&S COFFEE EGGS – If it’s coffee-flavored, we’re all in! So when we spotted these Coffee Eggs as part of this year’s M&S Easter range, we knew we had to try them. 

Each box includes 2 milk chocolate eggs and 2 dark chocolate eggs, all filled with a delicious vanilla and coffee center. 

The taste? Spot on! The coffee flavor is rich and authentic, perfectly balanced by the sweet vanilla fondant. We especially enjoyed the milk chocolate eggs, though the dark chocolate ones were a touch too bitter for our liking. 

You can grab these now at @marksandspencerfood. 

SR Rating: 7.8/10

hashtags: thisisnotjust
caption:
We declare 2025 as the year of the brain! 

Eating a balanced diet to support brain function and health is an area of hugely growing interest. 

So to make it easier to spot the foods that help, we’ve created our colourful new Brain Food range!

The M&S Brain Food range champions six brain health-supporting nutrients that many people lack in their diets: omega 3 (DHA), iron, zinc, iodine, folate, zinc, and vitamin B12. All products in the range contain at least two of these nutrients, carry our M&S Eat Well health seal of approval, and taste delicious! 

So whether you’re starting your day with cereal, grabbing a smoothie or bar on the go, or diving into a super salad for lunch or dinner, support your brain health in the process!

Keep your eyes peeled for some of our favourites this week 

Find the Brain Food range NOW in your local M&S Foodhall!

#thisisnotjust

caption:
NEW M&S Choccy Cherry Mallow Whips 
They're back for another year, but with a twist! These delicious Mallow Whips from M&S have had a makeover since we reviewed them last year.

What’s new? Last year, they came in packs of three, but this time, you can buy them individually. Plus, the flavour has changed to cherry, now paired with a dark chocolate base. 

Thankfully, they still feature that beautifully light, fluffy, and sticky mallow filling we love! The tangy cherry flavour blends perfectly with the milk and dark chocolate, making each bite a treat.

Available now at @marksandspencerfood for just £1.25 each.

SR Rating: 8.2 / 10

Will you be picking one up for someone special (or maybe yourself)?

caption:
⭐ New in the M&S Foodhall – MUSH-try new shots ‍
 
Our super product developers have been at it again, uncovering the world’s top food trends to bring to our Foodhalls. And this time, the trend is coming straight from LA, say hello to YAY Mushrooms! ‍‍

We’ve spent months working with the scientists at the Royal Botanic Gardens, Kew – global experts on mushrooms and their qualities - to confirm the identity and quality of the lion’s mane and reishi mushroom powders in our YAY! Mushroom drinks.
 
 Bring the Zing to your day with our AM Shot – made with ginger, lime, matcha, ginseng and lion’s mane mushrooms.
 
 Or wind down with our PM Shot– made with berries, lavender and reishi mushrooms.
Plus keep your eyes peeled for more marvellous mushroom drinks in store now …
 
Will you be starting a new daily ritual from AM to PM?

hashtags: mymarks
caption:
Grateful to serve as the closing keynote speaker at the 2nd Mindanao Youth Marketing Summit, a gathering that has clearly grown in size, scale, and spirit since last year. The energy was electric, and the future of marketing looks bright in the hands of these purpose-driven student leaders from Xavier U-Ateneo de Cagayan. 

Special admiration goes to their dynamic adviser, Raymund Acedera, whose passion you can feel in every detail of the summit. His tireless commitment, along with the support of his equally inspiring partner Edie, reminds me so much of how Chiqui and I work, as partners in life and in purpose.

It was a privilege to join Mansmith CEO Chiqui Escareal-Go in answering some of the most pressing marketing questions from Mindanao’s esteemed marketing professors before our respective talks — she brought insights from an anthropological lens, while I shared from a brand marketing perspective. Conversations like these bridge generations of marketers and help sharpen the path forward.

In my keynote, I focused singlemindedly on lessons from the watch industry, a lens through which I emphasized a core belief: how we think inevitably shapes how we act. To truly think differently, we must intentionally adopt five key paradigms of thinking: 1) systemic thinking, 2) critical thinking, 3) big-picture thinking, 4) creative thinking, and 5) transformative thinking.

Thank you again for the warm welcome and the meaningful exchange. The future is in good hands. #mymarks
