hashtags: Clarewatkinspersonalstyling, personalstylist, stylist, personalstylistmanchester, manchesterstyle, manchester, personalshoppermanchester, stylecoach, imageconsultant, wardrobestylist, personalshopper, personalstylistcheshire, cheshirestylist, cheshirestyle, cheshire, personalstylistaltrincham, fashionover40, 40plusstyle, size16style, petitestyle, mymarks, marksandspencer
caption:
Well this red waistcoat didn’t half cause a stir on stories this week when I wore it during my daily car chat. So it seemed only right to give the whole outfit a post of its own. 

Not only did it cause a stir on social media, but in real life too - with quite a few compliments received, including some from strangers. There’s something special about a compliment coming from another woman, don’t you agree? 

I believe the true power of this outfit is in the colour of the waistcoat. Under Seasonal Colour Analysis, I am a Spring with a warm undertone to my skin. So this warm, clear, bright red is the perfect shade to compliment my skin tone. In fact, it’s the exact shade I wear on my nails every day. The power of knowing and wearing your ‘best’ colours should never be underestimated and the love for this red waistcoat demonstrates that. When you know you know and my Colour Analysis clients can vouch for that. 

For more information about my Colour Analysis service please visit www.clarewatkins.com

I’ve linked this whole look on my @shop.ltk account. Simply download the app and follow me on there at ‘Clare Watkins Personal Styling’ and I’ll link on stories too.

caption:
Stunning morning spent at the Tulleys Tulip Fields, Sussex 
*Prinvite 

This is a must visit if you’re local to Sussex!! The fields of tulips are absolutely breathtaking and much more spectacular than I was expecting! 

There’s also enchanted forest trail to explore with windmills, unicorns, multicolour mushrooms, endless butterflies and picnic spots with toasted marshmallow stations!

caption:

Our Our Best Ever Yule Log!

You’ve met our show-stopping Garlic Camembert Twist…now fancy something a little meatier?

We all know one sausage roll is just never enough, so we’ve created a wreath made up of 16 of them! 

Our Collection Handcrafted Christmas Sausage Roll Garland is a party food hole-in-one, made with all-butter puff pastry parcels filled with outdoor-bred pork, sage and caramelised onions.

Enjoy it at its most golden and buttery, warm from the oven. We’re declaring this a Christmas buffet ESSENTIAL.

caption:
THIS IS NOT JUST CHRISTMAS PARTY FOOD… ⁠
⁠
We’d love to be a fly on the wall when the M&S party food is discussed, because we’re pretty sure no one around that boardroom table is saying 'No, Arabella, that's a silly idea'. Arabella does what she wants.⁠
⁠
And that means we’ve got another year of incredibly extravagant, slightly silly party food from everyone’s favourite fancy supermarket. ⁠
⁠
From the viral turkey feast dip to a DIY charcuterie board in the shape of a Christmas tree, plus festive bao (why), tiny Yorkshire puddings, and food so fancy we had to google it, @marksandspencer has gone all out. ⁠
⁠
 Click the link in our bio for the full list. ⁠
⁠
#themanc #manchester #mcr #marksandspencer #mands #partyfood #christmas #thisisnotjust

caption:
⭐ New in the M&S Foodhall – PAWSOME new celebration cakes 

Colin’s got some new furry friends joining in the birthday celebrations.

Meet Ralph, the cutest, curliest Cavapoo cake. Made with squishy chocolate sponge and lashings of caramel flavoured icing just try resisting those floppy ears, teeny pink tongue and puppy dog eyes!

And if Ralph wasn’t adorable enough on his own…how about some perfect mini puppers too?

Our new Walter The Sausage Dog Minis are the cutest roly-poly chocolate treats, perfect for any party spread or picky tea.

Which pup are you inviting to your next party?

hashtags: thisisnotjust
caption:
⭐ New in the M&S Foodhall – CHRISTMAS EDITION– sprout-acular side alert! 

Scrummy enough to convert even the most ardent of sprout haters, our Collection Brussels Sprout Gratin is the creamy, cheesy, oozy side for all of your festive feasting.

We’ve combined our British Brussels sprouts with a rich white wine sauce, Barber’s West Country farmhouse vintage Cheddar and stringy mozzarella, plus leeks and cavolo nero for extra greeny goodness.
But that’s not it. We’ve then topped it all off with a crispy onion and ciabatta breadcrumb topping for added crunch.

Just don’t be surprised when even the “sprout haters” go in for seconds 

Find it in your local M&S Foodhall or on @ocadouk NOW 

#thisisnotjust

caption:

Our Christmas on the Beach! 

New to the Foodhall this year, this perfectly pre-mixed cocktail has already proved a massive hit, with customers LOVING this festive twist on the summertime classic.

Made with classic vodka, cranberry and orange juices, this limited edition version includes spices and peach flavouring for a special warming surprise.

Enjoy this ready-to-drink wonder over ice and finish with your favourite garnish for fuss-free yet totally crowd-pleasing festive hosting!

Find it in the M&S Foodhall 

Please Drink Responsibly.

caption:

This Our Best Ever Yule Log really is the crème de la crème of festive chocolate rolls.​

Lovingly made with a thick yet super-light chocolate sponge, it’s filled with Madagascan vanilla cream and milk and dark chocolate ganache, then hand-finished with Belgian chocolate ganache and decorated with dark and white chocolate curls.​

Fudgy, gooey and outrageously chocolatey - it took MONTHS of development. We predict it’ll disappear in minutes ​

If your family prefers their Christmas cakes on the spongy-side, then this super-cute Cabin Cake is an absolute must.​

Made with a lightly spiced sponge, enriched with Madagascan vanilla extract and speculoos spiced biscuit flavouring, it’s then hand-decorated with creamy speculoos and rich white chocolate buttercreams, and finished with the sweetest decorations.​

caption:
⭐ New in the M&S Foodhall – CHRISTMAS EDITION– festive pies in disguise! 

This golden shortcrust delight may look like a regular pork pie, but hiding inside is a surprise worthy of any festive buffet table.

In another of our magical mash-ups, we’ve combined the very best parts of a pork pie with the most incredibly flavoured Coronation turkey filling.

Hand-finished and ready-to-eat, it’s made with British turkey and outdoor bred pork, gently seasoned with curry spices and finished with a silky mango chutney jelly.

Will you be adding one to your buffet spread this Christmas?

Find our Coronation Turkey Pie in your local M&S Foodhall or on @ocadouk NOW

caption:
✨ Swipe to see the transformation: After → During → Before!
This kitchen went from dated to dreamy.

We opened up the space by knocking down walls and extending into the garden, creating a spacious open-plan living area. One of my favorite things? As soon as you walk in, your eyes go straight to the kitchen—framed beautifully by a 1-meter-wide entry that offers a full view.

We combined modern finishes with earthy tones, and the skylight and sliding doors flood the space with natural light.

Which stage do you love most—the final reveal or the behind-the-scenes?

Spring is a reminder that fresh starts are always possible 

Living on an island makes us appreciate the small things even more..like feeling the sun on our skin, the breeze from the sea  and having nature right at our feet. These are the moments that inspire us the most ✨

This season, we’re leaning into light fabrics, clean lines, and calm energy  wearing pieces from the Marks & Spencer Cyprus Spring Collection, made for days just like this 

Because slowing down lets us notice what really matters

hashtags: guthealth, gutfriendly, gutmicrobiome, prebiotics, fermentedfood, shoppinghaul, weeklyshop, whatieat, mands, sainsburys, kimchi, kefir
caption:
This week I popped in M&S for a few bits then finished my shop in Sainsbury’s. I always pick up a few live cultured and fermented foods each week to enjoy along side my high fibre foods. 

The sauerkraut is a new one for me so I’m hoping I like it, so I can make it a regular. 

I like to have the kimchi from M&S as the tubs are smaller and only me eats this in my house and I hate wasting it. I sometimes add spoonfuls to my tuna to spice it up. 

Now with kimchi, and I’m going to guess sauerkraut too, I don’t hate it but I certainly don’t love it, I know it’s good for me so I just try to include it in my diet so if anyone has any good recipes or ideas on how to eat these let me know. 

The gut microbiome is really important to overall health and it’s a popular topic now. But to keep it simple you need to look after the bacteria in your gut and have a variety of microbiome each day and week for optimal health and immunity. 

So if you don’t eat these items regularly, give them a try, add them to your shopping list.  

#guthealth #gutfriendly #gutmicrobiome #prebiotics #fermentedfood #shoppinghaul #weeklyshop #whatieat #mands #sainsburys #kimchi #kefir

hashtags: stitchyrichiedesign, stroudfarmersmarket, homegrown, stroud, shoplocal, gloucestershire, lovelunch, marksandspencer, mandsfood, mands, sourdough, soup, instafood, foodphotography, blackvelvetstyling
caption:
EARLY SPRING DAYS FLIP BETWEEN A WARM GLOW AND A CRISP FRESHNESS....and returning from a sunny weekend in Stroud, a chilly day needed a hearty bowl of Carrot, Orange and Ginger soup put together with our Stroud Farmers Market Forage....knobbly carrots...smoked garlic....and celery leaves added to our last home grown butternut squash from late summer....an apple....warming spices...a bayleaf...gently caramelised in organic coconut oil then soothed by vegetable broth and finished with a splash of freshly squeezed orange juice...a slice of quirky carrot sauteed in butter with a celery leaf for garnish. The open sandwich of slices of juicy heritage tomatoes, applewood smoked cheddar shards, sliced apple sprinkled with pink peppercorns and bittersweet red edged chicory leaves on M&S olive sourdough brought sunshine to the table...HAPPY DAYS !

@stroudmarket
@blackbelvetstying

caption:
BUNAGEDDON 2025 IS OVER!!!!

It's been an epic year of bunning - I feel like I started in January! Here are my top 5 buns of 2025...

1) M & S Extemely Chocolatey Buns.
2) Tesco Strawberries & Clotted Cream Buns.
3) M & S Extremely Cheesey Buns.
4) Waitrose Belgian Chocolate Buns.
5) M & S Extremely Lemony Buns

So, clearly, Marks are the bun masters.

Serious credit goes to Asda for their Tiramisu ones, Tesco's St Clement's, Sainsbury's Chocolate & Caramel, and M & S' Bramley Apple.

What do you make of my list? Have I missed anything?

Have you tried these?

What should I review next?

Want to send me something to review? Send me a DM!

hashtags: coordset, blackandbeige, linenoutfit, mymarks
caption:
So what did I buy?

I think you guessed - it was the waistcoat and linen mix trousers!

I wore this outfit Saturday to see Mi Chica performing in 42nd St. We had a lovely afternoon and because we went to the matinée she was able to join us at @alsantofulham for an hour (lovely restaurant,  highly recommend if you're ever in Fulham). 

I wore the black co-ord with a creamy beige lightweight blazer, kitten heel shoes and a leopard neck scarf. I don't normally wear black but I made an exception for this outfit as I truly loved it the moment I put it on. That's what its about isn't it? Loving your clothes and making them your own.

Happy Tuesday! Mi Chica is home now and we have a trip to the hair salon lined up for today.

Linen mix trousers,  waistcoat, blazer and shoes all @marksandspencer
@marksandspencerstyle

Bag @eliebeaumont - AD

hashtags: marksandspencer, marksandspencerstyle, holidaystyleinspo, summerstyleessentials, linenshorts, midlifestyleblogger, mymarks
caption:
Found a few holiday essentials at @marksandspencer and wore them on repeat on holiday.
I may even be wearing them next week when the sunshine reappears. ☀️

1. The most flattering swimsuit that I wore as a bodysuit. Love a square neckline. 
2. A classic pair of white shorts that I loved so much, I’ve since bought them in navy.
3. Slightly obsessed with the drawstring grey & white trousers. Wore them with the swimsuit & linen shirt. 
4. The drawstring black linen shorts were also a winner in the extreme heat on holiday. 
5. The white drawstring linen trousers were worn on repeat and I will definitely be adding a black pair.

Along with a few loose sleeveless tees and a linen or cotton shirt, a hat, basket bag, flip flops & plenty of SPF, they were the perfect pieces to take to a very hot and humid Thailand. I’ve also added a very stylish woven bag I spotted last week.
I’ll tag everything in Stories. 

#marksandspencer #marksandspencerstyle #holidaystyleinspo #summerstyleessentials #linenshorts #midlifestyleblogger #mymarks

caption:

hashtags: eatin, eatingout, drinking, hotcrossbun, mands, marksandspencer, foodie, lovefood, lovedrink, lovedrinking, foodphotography, foodporn, foodblogger, foodstagram, foodpics, foodforfoodies, foodinstagram, fooddiary, foodspotting, foodreviews, honestblogging, supportinglocalbusiness, findingnewplaces, tryingnewplaces, honest, honestreviews, collabs
caption:
HOT CROSS BUNS

Have you tried the new M&S hot cross buns? I finally managed to get my hands on these! They are all yummy…

✨ Dippy egg hot cross buns - at only 99 calories per bun, these are a lovely treat if you fancy something sweet (but not too sweet) and want to still be good. The chocolate flavour is lovely and the middle tastes like custard to me. Very different and worth a try. You can eat cold but I warm them in the air fryer.
✨ Lemon curd filled hot cross buns - MY personal fave! Sweet and tangy and just insanely good. Again enjoy cold but I do warm up in the air fryer and they are just gooey and delicious.
✨ Cinn-a-yum buns - Not exactly a hot cross bun but delicious non the less. Heat these up for a lovely warm cinnamon bun, perfect with a cuppa, which they all are to be honest ☺️

I would buy all three again, in fact I have bought the dippy egg and cinnamon-a-yum buns again as the lemon ones are like rocking horse doo dah 

My only criticism is the packaging on the cinn-a-yum buns, it ruins the lovely sugar glaze on the top which ends up wasted on the wrapping! Surely there’s a better way?

 Any M&S food hall (if you’re lucky)
 @marksandspencerfood

hashtags: foodshop, whatieat, upf, foodswaps, healthyfoodchoices, supermarketshopping, mands
caption:
If you want to reduce the amount of ultra processed foods you eat, start by making simple swaps when you do your weekly shop, 

These are a few items I picked up from M&S this week. 

1.) CHICKEN BONE BROTH. Now these are amazing, there’s a beef one too, they are made with bones so natural collagen. By far my favourite stock. The shelf in the freezer is often bare so stock up when you see them.

2.) SAN FRANCISCO SOURDOUGH. These are baked fresh and are delicious. A nice short list of ingredients. I like to find my favourite bread in each store and this is my go too in M&S.

3.) AUTHENTIC GREEK YOGURT. Greek yogurt is a staple weekly item for me, avoid Greek style and have the real thing, this is made with just milk. 

4.) CREAMY TZATZIKI. You can make a tzatziki fairly simply at home but for speed this is decent, I have this on wraps and dollop it on salads. Some shop bought tzatziki can have a long list of unidentifiable items, so this is decent alternative. 

5.) RICH ITALIAN TOMATO & BASIL SOUP. My son loves a tomato soup and this is my favourite one. I don’t like buying tinned soup anymore due to microplastics in the tin lining so I have been on the hunt for a store cupboard replacement. This tastes good and has decent ingredients list. 

I love food and ingredients and i am always looking for good food that is minimally processed, let me know your faves. 

Like this post if you want to see more supermarket swaps and save to remind what to put in your trolley next time  

#foodshop #whatieat #upf #foodswaps #healthyfoodchoices #supermarketshopping #mands

hashtags: marksandspencerme, mymarks, ad
caption:
Just popped into the @marksandspencerme foodhall and was so impressed with all their new and healthy options - perfect for easy, nourishing meals!  

I picked up British strawberries, baby watermelon, and clementines. 
The strawberries are packed with vitamin C and antioxidants, great for skin and immune health. 
Baby watermelon is super hydrating and naturally sweet, 
 and clementines are a juicy source of immune-boosting vitamin C. 

 I also grabbed some salmon and asparagus - salmon, rich in omega-3s for heart and brain support, and asparagus is full of fiber and folate to aid digestion and energy. 

Loving how easy it is to eat well with fresh, seasonal goodness like this!

Available at selected M&S foodhalls across Dubai!
#marksandspencerme #mymarks #ad

caption:
Summer picnic inspo 
• The blanket is from glossier, glasses from Lisa Angel, little bowls from anthropologie, and the plates are Emma Bridgewater. 
• The new m&s speckled egg cookies are 10/10 
• The m&s 3 for £8 deli deal is perfect for picnics
• We picked up some fresh tulips 
• We got fresh bread and fillings to make sandwiches. 
• Fresh fruit to keep it healthy.
• M&S cocktail cans and their fresh a still lemonade to drink 
This cost around £50ish for two for the food plus £16 entrance to Lyme Park. 

#picnic #summer #nationaltrust #manchester #foodie #brunch #lunch #foodreviews #mands #mandsfood

hashtags: rosewine, mands, marksandspencer, winelover, summerwine, frenchrosé, france, frenchwine, balconne, organicwine
caption:
La Balconne Organic Provence Rosé

Notes of white peach, strawberry and wild herbs making this a soft but complex rosé. 
On first thought this rosé looked on the sweeter side but I was pleasantly surprised to find this more a dry crisp rose, which makes this the perfect summer drink!

People are saying this is M&S’s version of Whispering Angel and at £4 cheaper a bottle, I would even say this is a better drink. 

 France

12.5%

£18.00, Marks and Spencer
#rosewine #mands #marksandspencer #winelover #summerwine #frenchrosé #france #frenchwine #balconne #organicwine

caption:
✨ @babymoriofficial, the award-winning baby and children’s sleepwear brand known for its sustainable and thoughtfully designed essentials, is launching its bestselling products on Marks & Spencer’s online platform, Brands at M&S.

The development marks the next chapter in MORI’s broader multi-channel growth strategy, as it expands beyond its direct-to-consumer roots and continues to reach new families through trusted retail partners.

M&S customers can discover a handpicked edit of MORI favourites including the bestselling Clever Zip Sleepsuits, supersoft bodysuits and breathable cellular blankets, as well as pieces from the Peter Rabbit by MORI collaboration.

hashtags: marksandspencer, marksandsparks, mands, highstreetbrands, retailhistory, centenary, plasticbags, plasticbagcollection, departmentstore, fashionstore
caption:
Marks and Spencer Centary Year. 1984

#marksandspencer #marksandsparks #mands #highstreetbrands #retailhistory #centenary #plasticbags #plasticbagcollection #departmentstore #fashionstore

Just a few gluten free goodies I've enjoyed recently! ⁠
⁠
1 & 2. Finally got round to trying @ugly.dumpling.uk in @brixton.village and it didn't disappoint - two of my favourites from the diverse gluten free selection was the cheeseburger  and the halloumi ⁠
3 & 4. DELISH cheese straws and croissants from @mannadew.london (they deliver UK nationwide but also now have a cafe next to their bakery in Battersea where you can try their goodies too)⁠
4. @goodfingpizza goals with a few cheeky jalapenos added and served with garlic @lurpak and veggies ⁠
5. A beautiful, citrus-y craft beer from @lakedownbrewingco at @hopstopbeers ⁠
6. @marksandspencerfood really do know how to do chocolate covered nuts which is demonstrated excellently with their 'Indulgent Nut Collection' which is all completely gluten free
mentions: ugly.dumpling.uk, brixton.village, mannadew.london, goodfingpizza, lurpak, lakedownbrewingco, hopstopbeers, marksandspencerfood

caption:
Weekly grocery staples 

These are the staple items that I get in my food shop every week  

Save this post or screenshot this list it you need some help putting together a weekly shopping list for a high protein, whole foods based week of meals:

Protein sources:
- Greek yogurt
- eggs
- egg whites
- chicken
- beef mince
- steak
- prawns
- salmon
- tuna

Carb sources:
- rice
- pasta
- bagels
- wraps
- sweet potato
- berries
- honey 

Fats:
- avocado 
- butter
- olive oil
- seeds/nuts
- kewpie mayo

Veggies:
- spinach
- lettuce
- cucumber
- mushrooms
- broccoli
- edamame 
- avocado 

Hope this helps
